campaign.story:
WELCOME FRIENDS
 Click on picture below to download your FREE PDF manual!
Let me tell you about our game. Join the Partisans (Postani partizan) is a WW2 board game with a historical background where players play as Slovenian Partisans to liberate their country.  
You have to roll the dice to win battles against the evil Axis powers, answer quiz questions on WW2 and perform various other tasks, including  singing, drawing or even preparing food for your fellow comrades, all to win the liberation war!
Have fun while learning history
Relive exciting historical events
 Spend great time with friends and family 
There are 5 different wooden Partisan figurines to choose from.
Take a look at who takes the role of the enemy:
Per each year of war you have to conquer one wooden white guard tower and one wooden coloured guard tower.
You can take a look and see how to battle in our game.
“All had one thing in common:
          an intense pride in their Movement and in its achievements.
For them, the outside world did not seem of immediate interest or importance.
          What mattered was their War of National Liberation,
          their struggle against the invader,
          their victories, their sacrifices.
          Of this, they were proudest of all, that they owed nothing to anyone;
          that they had got so far without outside help.”
- Sir Fitzroy Maclean’s understanding of the partisan movement and its motivation
Complete more than 150 missions (based on real events) from General Headquarters (HQ) and answer over 200 questions in The Partisan school! 
And draw a Special ops card from the pile to: Liberate the prisoners, Blow up the bridge, Evacuate the wounded, Destroy the enemy airfield and many more.    
When players scan our QR code on Special Ops cards they will be diverted to our page where they'll recieve over 40 video orders - like this one:
We added a few more things:
 Stars & Traitors
It is the most essential add-on to have for our game. It changes the gameplay dramatically. Players can build up their partisan to have greater firepower, to move faster or to get more questions in the Partisan school. They can also receive partisans ranks.
Join the Partizans Jr. is a quick mini game for players to carry around in hand made artisanal pouch. The number of puzzles determines the lenght of the game. Build your own war path.
Join the partisans JR. - mini game
We also added a comic strip Partisan. Made after my song Partisan. Iztok - our ilustrator and me join forces and created this beautifull work of art togather. It is the best description of Partisan mentality.
Comic strip Partisan - translated into English
And since during WW2 lots of brave people from different nationalities managed  to join partisan forces in Yugoslavia we formed 1st International brigade. It consist of 5 fighters.
1st International brigade
5 extra figurines: Henrik - a German who joined the Partisans, Frenk - British soldier who escaped german captivity, a member of Soviet military mission Vasilij, a Tuskegee Airmen captain Jackson and Italian partisan Guido come with 5 additional Special OPS cards.

And yes, you too can be awarded with a special medal for bravery!
Only one medal can be earned per year!
Medals are attached by a magnet to prevent any destruction of your clothing.
In the end I am going to leave you with a song I recorded a while ago to boost the moral of my fellow countryman and to remind them of our glorious fight against nazifascism in which we won!
See you on the battlefield!  
LARSO
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges

As this is a new edition of an existing game, much of the initial artwork and development of Join the Partisans has already been completed. We have been working on the second edition for over a year.

We are planning to use the same factories that produced the 1st edition of Join the Partisans (Postani partizan).

We are planning to use the same fulfillment partners we have worked with in the past.

For our domestic and US fulfillment operation, we are using the same suppliers for cardboard cartons and packaging.

We are fully aware of potential delays that may happen with products that are produced overseas: printer production schedules, major holidays (Lunar New Year, National Week), shipping, and customs delays. We will work diligently to minimize these types of disruptions and promise to communicate transparently with our backers if they occur.

We have estimated delivery for October 2021. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their rewards sooner than others.

For shiping we use Package Sender, a booking engine website offering door-to-door shipping services for packages and documents. They cooperate with top logistics companies to ensure you the best and most reasonable solution. 
For UK backers, the cost of shipping is higher due to Brexit.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Every child will be able to identify with the heroes and heroines in our books, including children of all colors, children with disabilities, those in wheelchairs, who wear glasses or children with cancer.
Unique You will help you create highly personalized softcover and hardcover books based on the interests, name, appearance, and personality traits of the child you love. You’ll be able to choose from over 300 main characters and 180,000 illustrations, 3 story backgrounds and over 70-character traits.
Experts agree that when kids can fully identify with a character and its challenges and victories, they are more likely to feel better about themselves. If children learn to value differences, they’ll grow up to be more loving, understanding and will appreciate the diverse world around them.
And we believe that Unique You Books can help. By teaching kids to value and love who they are, we want to ignite positive changes for them and the world! Together, we have the power to do just that!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The Unique You Team is made up of seasoned illustrators, designers, copywriters, programmers and marketers, but we’ve never published a book before. To minimize risks, we started working on this project over two years ago. The book is fully written and we’ve finished the character designs. We are also working with a trusted printer who will ship the books directly to you to reduce wait time.

Potential challenges include possible delays in shipping due to COVID-19 or other unforeseen circumstances. But we promise to keep you regularly updated about our progress or any delays that may arise, no matter what. And if you have any questions, you can write us at info@unique-you.net and we’ll be happy to be in touch.

campaign.story:
Hello, my dear! Please allow me to welcome you to my Kickstarter campaign. After months of work with lots of sleepless nights, I'm very very excited to finally announce the (drumroll please) ...
Fantôme tarot deck is a full card deck. As a tool for spiritual guidance, it enables you to receive a tarot reading to connect to your inner wisdom. The name itself honors the guiding hand of tarot and your inner spirit in the cards. The design is a culmination of my love for geometry, mystery, and traditional brutalist artwork all blended together with the storytelling of tarot. The deck is also accompanied by a special multidimensional guidebook in the form of an augmented reality app. The app will help beginners learn more about the cards and how to practice tarot. It will also contain intriguing content for more advanced readers. A printed version of the guidebook will be included as well. Please check out this campaign to learn more about Fantôme.

Table of Contents

The deck will consist of the full 22 Major Arcana and 56 Minor Arcana, broken into four suits of wands, cups, coins, and swords. When making this deck I focused on three things:
 GREAT DESIGN - I wanted to offer you a gorgeous tarot deck,
 TOP-NOTCH QUALITY - I wanted it to survive the rigors of everyday use,
 UNIQUE EXPERIENCE - and last but almost most important, I wanted to offer you a unique guidebook experience.
A Bewitching Design
Fantôme's design draws inspiration from brutalist architecture - a style that was an ethos of ‘social utopianism’ in the previous century. This style is generally characterized by its rough surfaces, unusual shapes, straight lines, and small openings. The night atmosphere and light illuminated icons symbolize how tarot helps us find our way even in the darkest moments. The iconography of its 78-card is based on the classical Rider-Waite-Smith tarot but reinterpreted through modern geometric design. Please take a look at the individual card designs below.
 For a more detailed view, you can access the cards here.
High-quality materials
A core concept of this deck is exceptional and unparalleled quality, both in its imagery and experience as well as in its construction and manufacture. Fantome aims to set a new standard in build quality and execution. The deck will stand up to the rigors of everyday use. Cards will be made from high-quality three-layer Italian card stock. The front part of the cards contains the beautiful full-frame artwork and the backside is partially covered with gorgeous ice blue foil. It's all packed in a rigid Lid-Bottom box to keep your deck safe wherever you take it. The size of the cards is 70 mm (~2.75 inches) wide and 120 mm (~4.75 inches) tall.
Fantôme's sturdy design and high-quality print make it easy to shuffle (it's a GIF, give it a second to load).
World's First Multidimensional Guidebook
Besides a printed guidebook this deck also comes with a beautifully designed multidimensional guidebook app. This augmented reality (AR) guidebook elevates the beauty of the card as well as pushes the idea of merging the reality which we live in and the expansive more energetic reality of Tarot.
The guidebook app will allow you to learn more about tarot and individual tarot card meanings. The app will also help you see other things - from popular card spreads to hidden design gems. The technology behind it is based on augmented reality and it provides a one-of-a-kind experience. Take a look at some of the things you will be able to do with this app below. 

Chose your guide.
The app will contain a personalized guide in the form of a cat (yes, I'm a cat lover) that will take you through the app experience. You'll be able to choose between different guide designs to personalize your guidebook experience.
Learn more about individual cards. 
There's a lot of symbolism in each tarot card.  With the Guidebook App, you will be able to see the most important symbols visualized through 3D models. If you click on them you can read more about each symbol.
Just point your phone towards a card to learn more about the symbolism behind it (it's a GIF, give it a second to load).
Learn about tarot spreads and when to use them.
Another thing you can do is use the app to learn more about different tarot spreads. Choose one of the available spreads, learn more about its use, and see how it should be laid out on the table. 
Tap where you want to place your virtual spread to see how it's done (it's a GIF, give it a second to load).
These are just a few things you'll be able to do in this multidimensional guidebook app. I have hidden plenty of easter eggs and additional content in the deck. It will also be continuously updated in the future. The app will support a list of Android and iOS devices.
Main reward: Fantôme Tarot Deck 
As this is a crowdfunding campaign for a tarot deck, the main reward is of course a tarot deck. Every deck will contain:
78 cards (22 major arcana + 56 minor arcana) + any bonus cards from Stretch goals
Printed guidebook - a pocket-size version
Digital multidimensional guidebook in the form of an AR app

REWARDS AVAILABLE: 
 One (1) deck - a great choice if you want to get a deck for yourself.
 Two (2) decks - 2 is better than 1, get one for yourself and one for a friend.
 Five (5) decks - this option is a good friends & family choice. Tarot for everyone.
 Ten (10) decks - if you're looking to buy wholesale then this is for you.
 Check the Add-ons section for more goodies available through this campaign.
There are additional items available. They are in two categories:
 Add-ons - items you can add to your selected campaign reward.
 Referral rewards - items you can earn if you refer a friend.
Read more about both categories below.
You can read more about the add-ons below.

Art prints
Besides being one of the main campaign rewards for backers, you can also get an art print as an add-on if you decide to purchase a deck. If the campaign is successful and you select this option you will be able to select one card which I will print for you as an A5 print (148 x 210 mm ~ 5.8 x 8.3 inches). 
Tarot cleansing kit
If you ever find that the energy of your tarot deck is feeling dull or you are having a difficult time connecting with your deck, it is likely that your cards need to be cleansed and charged. Cleansing your tarot cards before or after every use will ensure there is no residual energy from previous use affecting your readings. Amethyst, palo santo, smudge stick, and rose quartz will help you to cleanse and charge your tarot deck.

 Fantôme Designed Tapestry / Pareo 
What you can see on the image below is a beautiful Fantôme-inspired wall tapestry that can also be used as a pareo (wraparound summer beachwear). It will be about 55 x 55 inches big (140 x 140 cm) and made from velvet chiffon. Chiffon velvet is a type of velvet that is very lightweight, allowing it to drape in a variety of ways. It is a special Kickstarter exclusive (!) add-on.
Tarot cards bag
Made out of lush deep blue velvet, decorated with enchanting embroidery, and adorned with adorable gold tassels, these tarot bags will keep your precious decks protected. Versatile as heck, you can use them to protect your precious tarot deck or for whatever else your heart so desires.
Tarot cloth
Interested in getting a spread cloth? Well, look no further. I prepared a Fantôme inspired tarot cloth if you're thinking to get a full set. Hopefully, this cloth will bring magical energy of renewal into your altar. As beautiful as it is functional, the cloth helps you create and read your spreads. It is available in silk. The size of the cloth is 55 cm x 55 cm (19.7 inches x 19.7 inches).
Enamel Pin
Get this lovely Fantôme-style enamel pin that the awesome backers of this campaign helped unlock through Stretch goals!
Mystery Sticker Pack
As this deck's motif revolves around the mysterious nature of tarot I wanted to incorporate a mystery add-on for anyone looking to spice up their selected reward. Pick this sticker pack and you'll see what's included when you receive your reward. 
There is another way how you can get delicious goodies from my campaign - refer a friend. I know that tarot is not the cheapest of hobbies, but I can truthfully say that quality comes at a price. I maxed out my cards and budget to get this deck to this point. Which means I'm kind of without any extra funds to promote it. But that's where we can help each other. Help me promote this Kickstarter campaign and you can earn some cool rewards. You will need a personal referral link to participate.
How to get your referral link?
 FIRST: Fill out this form - Application Form 
 SECOND: I'll send you back your personal referral link. I'll check the form 2x per day, so please be patient if you don't get it right away.
 THIRD: Once you get the link, share it with friends and within your tarot community, but please be polite and respectful in doing so.
What are the referral rewards?
Get 2 friends to back this project by purchasing a deck - A free art print (value 15 EUR or 17 USD) 
Get 5 friends to back this project by purchasing a deck - A free tarot deck (value 55 EUR or 66 USD) 
Get 10 friends or more to back this project by purchasing a deck - A free tarot deck with all Add-on items included  (value of 125 EUR or 147 USD) 
You are not able to use your referral links for your own purchases.
If you're new to Kickstarter, a Stretch goal is a point set past the original funding amount where a new aspect of the project is "unlocked". This is possible as the cost of production usually drops with increased order volume. If there is something you'd like to see included in the project, feedback is always welcome.

The idea to launch a new deck was rolling in my head for a while. I started working on it in September last year. Things really started to get going after the new year when I got some encouragement from the Tarot community. Right now we're in the middle of the Kickstarter campaign. If it's successful, the production will start at the beginning of June 2021.  If everything goes to plan, I believe I'll be able to ship out the orders in September 2021.
Up to now, the project is funded by myself in its entirety. A big thank you goes to my existing customers whose support allowed me to be a tarot deck designer in the first place. By backing this project you will help turn Fantome into a tarot deck with a unique guidebook experience that will bring joy to countless tarot readers around the world.

Last but not least, please let me introduce myself. My name is Esra and I'm the creative force ("jack of all trades") behind this project. I'm an ex-art teacher living abroad with my husband. The new environment and a break from teaching really allowed my love for the tarot to flourish. The result of that love is La Muci Design.  La Muci Design is a small boutique shop that delights customers with its tarot decks, oracle decks, and other spiritual items. Every item is crafted until perfection and created with lots of love. And based on the customer reviews, that love is felt all around the world.

A final word
I appreciate each one of you helping bring this project to life, truly, really. Your feedback throughout the design process was incredibly valuable. Please keep in mind, all of these images are of the first prototypes, there are bound to be changes to the design as the project evolves.

From the bottom of my heart thank you, thank you, thank you.
Feel free to connect with me on social media:
Facebook
Instagram
Twitter

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

support.title: Adopt a bee & insect hotel
support.descp:
Many single ladies don't live in colonies, don't produce honey or wax. These things are crucial for them to make their home. Solitary bees are easily overlooked but they pollinate plants more efficiently than honeybees. A single red mason bee is equivalent to 120 worker honeybees! Your pledge provides the material for these bees and their happily ever after. Bzzzzz!
Bee a good person and help us find them homes and sanctuaries in the forest. The insect hotel will have your name on it and it will be made by local carpenters.

campaign.story:
What is 3Gen?
3Gen's primary goal is to enable simple creation and modification of 2D images, textures and 3D objects. It is meant for artists, game developers, software engineers, visual effects experts and computer graphics enthusiasts. Idea is to make Application as user-friendly, simple and fun as much as possible.

Applications
There are 3 Applications that are currently available or in the development:
 ImaGen - Images Generator and Editor. ImaGen is a subset of 3Gen and It is already available as standalone application on Gumroad. ImaGen currently contains more than 100 nodes for manipulation of images and textures. 
 3Gen - 3D Worlds Generator. It is Autodesk Maya's plug-in (add-on). Maya is one of the most popular software for 3D modelling and animation.  3Gen contains all the features ImaGen has and many more for creating and editing 3D models. It currently contains more than 130 nodes.
 3Vial - Trivial 3D Engine. It is in the initial stages of development. It will contain all the features 3Gen has but it is going to be standalone 3D Engine.

 Follow the development
I am trying to post newly developed features and tutorials at least once per month. You can follow development on my:
 Youtube channel 
 3Gen Facebook Page 
 Here are some previous demos for the new features. You can find many more on my Youtube channel. 
Why am I doing a Kickstarter?
Pledged amount reduced by fees and taxes will cover all the costs of software licenses, books, scientific papers and publications for up to 3 years. More than half of the time I develop 3Gen is spent on research. Also, I'm collecting a lot of ideas from the already existing 3D Applications and Engines that are not cheap. If I however collect a lot more I will be able to work on these Applications full time which will drastically speed up the progress. But, to be completely honest, promotion that Kickstarter offers is what I'm currently looking for. 

Who am I?
I am Nemanja. I have masters degree in Applied Mathematics and I have 5 years of experience as software engineer in several different areas: embedded software, compiler development, graphics programming, scientific computing, computer vision, image processing, procedural content generation, artificial intelligence, data science, automotive...
Contact:  LinkedIn,  Artstation
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I am confident that I have the skills, experience and know-how to make this project a reality. There are relatively few risks involved in realization of this project/s. Part of the 3Gen for image manipulation is already available for download (ImaGen). However, this is a massive project that I am developing alone so there is always a chance that some higher power could prevent me from continuing my work. But, lets be positive :) Nothing stopped me in the previous 3 years.

campaign.story:
Hey, we are back!
Thanks to Kickstarter we were able to bring pocket watches back to life in 2015 when we have successfully fulfilled our first campaign. Now we are back for the MAKE 100 special!
We are making 100 unique wooden pocket watch stands that complement our pocket watches, transforming them into desk clocks.
In the 19th century Levi Strauss & Co. introduced the small pocket on jeans so miners, cowboys, railway, and other workers could keep their fragile pocket watches from getting broken. It has remained there ever since, despite pocket watches being replaced by wristwatches. Our mission is to bring pocket watches back to life.
Daily, we get distracted by notifications and text messages that are screaming for our attention. We are forgetting about ourselves and the time that is slipping by. We realized that we should value our time more and that we should by no means be slaves of the hectic lifestyle and technology. The Itero Pocket Watch was born.
Time is an important dimension we have created to order events in the past, present, and future. Keeping time is the key to success. With Itero Pocket Watches, you carry an important piece of the past in your pocket and value yourself and your time more.
Slim design, decorative wood, the analog spirit in your digital world. Rest your eyes. 
Put your Itero pocket watch on the stand. We promise you won’t stop looking at it.
Not only is the pocket watch stand useful, but it also makes a great decoration for an office or a living room.

The name Itero comes from Latin and means »to do a second time, to renew«. And that is what we wanted to do – to bring the appreciation of time and tradition back to life.
We have decided to participate in the MAKE 100 Kickstarter January project.  Many of you have expressed interest in the Wooden Pocket Watch stands, which transforms Itero into a desk clock, which we have run out of.
For that reason, we are going to make a Kickstarter MAKE wooden watch stands made out of a single piece of walnut or oak. 
The variance in the wood patterns and color gives every stand a bespoke look. To satisfy your specific preferences, we are going to enable you to pick the exact stand you would like to receive after the campaign.
Every stand comes with an Itero Pocket Watch.  3 distinct colors are available.
We designed a pocket watch stand, made out of solid wood from the local forests. Precisely crafted in Slovenia, EU.
Solid walnut wood and oak will be used to make the pocket watch stands even more luxurious and durable. Every stand is treated with oil to provide the best natural conservation.
All the stands will be made locally from the woods of Slovenia. Our home country is the third most forested country in Europe, just behind Sweden and Finland.
 Our pocket watch stand has been carefully designed to perfectly fit the Itero Pocket Watch. We followed contemporary design guidelines to create a piece that fits well in every space. 
 Modern design makes the Itero Pocket Watch suitable for a diverse range of styles. 
With an Itero Pocket Watch, you will make a lasting impression.
Itero is designed for those, who care about fashion and tradition.
Adapted to a modern gentleman.
Custom engraving is available to make your watch unique. Put on your life motto, a quote, a special date, or something that you love. For only 10€ you can give it a whole new meaning.
Our mission is to bring pocket watches back to life. We decided to design pocket watches with a modern look, suitable for every style. Itero watches are only 8 millimetres thin, providing a slim fit for every pocket.
Three color combinations are available.

MIDAS BLACK
MIDNIGHT BRONZE
MIDAS WHITE

Case diameter: 44 milimetres
Thickness: 8 milimetres 
Case material: 316L stainless steel, PVD plated
Dial window material: Sapphire crystal glass 
Movement: Swiss Ronda Quartz 
Water resistant: 3 ATM 
Keychain: 25 centimetres (included)
Keychain material: PVD plated brass

we would like to be completely honest with you. We bumped into big issues that were part of the printing process. On delivery, we found out that more than 50% of all structures were unusable because they didn't meet the quality standard we required. We know, that we have made a big mistake, and should have shared this information with you immediately. After the setback due to illness, we wanted to start shipping right away and were relying on the producers to have a quick solution to the problem, but experienced delay after delay.

Dear backers,
as we said in the previous update we are recovering well and slowly coming back to full fitness! 
We have started full-on with packaging and preparing parcels for shipping to send them out to you. Shipping is our top priority right now since there was an unexpected delay caused by the illness.

Dear backers!
We know all of you are already waiting to receive your rewards, and finally, start using them.
We are happy to inform you that we are recovering well from the Covid-19 setback.

campaign.story:
Good Morning. Its me.
THE REINVENTION OF THE BASKETBALL NET
 MEET KHARBONET 
The Basketball net is arguably the most important piece of equipment in basketball -- equaled perhaps only by the ball itself. Without the net, there is no game. While having a net is essential, it's also highly important to have a net of an appropriate height.
There was a time when basketball nets were a simple thing. From wooden peach baskets attached to balcony railings to today’s unbreakable basketball nets, the evolution of the basketball goal was influenced to a degree by 2016 NBA Hall of Fame inductee Shaquille O’Neal. BUT first, why we need a basketball net on the hoop?
First Carbon Fiber Basketball Net you’ve been waiting for.
There are some benefits to having a net on the hoop. Now nets help break a ball's fall. The net helps control the direction of the ball when going through the rim, besides when the ball hits the rim first and bounces through, The net helps slow the ball down so it's not always bouncing the headlight after a make and usually makes the ball land in the same general area after going through. Nets give players a sense of depth for good aim and allow refs to see what the basket was made of. Without a net it's sometimes hard to tell if someone has made a bucket or not. Beyond these functions, nets add to the audio, kinetic and aesthetic experience that leaves players driving for "nothin but net." Think about how your net might move, look, sound and function. Unconventional approaches are encouraged.
BLACK & WHITE CARBON FIBER BASKETBALL NET.
So we carefully designed it to give you the most satisfaction on your basketball game.
 BUT WHY KHARBONET IS OUTSTANDING? 
EXTREMELY DURABLE
The unique material used in the KHARBONET assures good weather resistance. For extra protection against the harsh weather the fibers are also UV stabilised. ALL WEATHER!
SUPER LIGHT & ULTRA FLEXIBLE
The special feature of the rope themselves is the low weight. The special material used assures extreme lightness. For better flexibility during temperature treatment double criss cross knitting was implemented.
UNIQUE INNOVATIVE DESIGN, SAFE & HANDMADE
Carbon fiber basketball net is being made by hand, which means each individual rope is being inspected from the beggining which provides high quality standard.
Carbon fiber basketball net is also easy washable!
The way our basketball net is designed, a better visualisation can be achieved, which means basketball players can better evaluate the net depth, which is crucial for succesfull throws on larger distances.
BEST MATERIAL
The basketball net is knitted out of carbon fibers. Some call it also the material of the future. This gives the net special values and uniqueness.
FITS ON ANY HOOP
No matter what brand the basketball ring is - our net fits them all.
Suitable for outdoor & indoor court !

TOP SOUND
Speaking of sound. Get your own net and then we can talk which net gives the better sound. While scoring nets "KHARBONET" is the only option for the best satisfaction while playing basketball. You have to try!
THE LIFESPAN
The Lifespan of CARBON FIBER BASKETBALL NET  is 3X longer than nylon nets, so we say that KHARBONET breaks the rules! hehe :) Remember that!
TECHNOLOGY
Carbon fibers are fibers thinner than a human hair, about 5-10 micrometres in diameter and composed mainly of carbon atoms. Carbon fibers are classified in mechanical engineering as a group of composite materials. This means that the material is composed of two or more building blocks that are joined together. In this case, carbon fibers appear as nuts made from organic materials, followed by fillers. Carbon fibers are often presented as a composite of the future, mainly because of its mechanical properties and low weight, making the material much more useful. If the fibers are acting in all directions, the fibers are positioned in such a way that some fibers are horizontally left up and vertically, and the fibers intertwine and transmit forces in all directions, usually such fabrication of fibers is said to be a fabric. Everybody knows the carbon fiber fabric, but what about the carbon fiber rope?
Prototyping...
Introducing the first Carbon Fiber Basketball Net on the market. WHITE EDITION.
What you can't see, it's what matters the most. It’s all about the little things that make the difference. BLACK EDITION.
GALLERY


 WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT OUR KICKSTARTER? 
We have put thousands of hours into this project to make it live! The team is full of enthusiastic and experienced individuals coming from various fields such as design, engineering, production and logistics. The complexity of this project required lots of knowledge and hard work. Together we have brought our dream project to life and we are excited about what lies ahead. We’re starting our journey with Kickstarter because we believe the backer community will play an integral role in the development of carbon fiber ropes. Through Kickstarter we’re not just pre-selling our products to early adopters, but rather forging relationships with a passionate community of innovative individuals. We want to show ourselves to the world, we want to share our product with the whole world. We want to show people what everything can be done from Carbon fiber.
Carbon rope has the potential to make innovation accessible, and we still have many more technologies we look forward to developing. But we can’t do it alone. In the age of Kickstarter, YOU have the power to decide which technologies become realized. With the team , we want to return the favor by giving you the power to create. 
THANK YOU!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since our first Kickstarter campaign in 2014, we’re on a journey of discovery in specialty coffee - roasting kick-ass coffee in our micro roastery and solving engineering puzzles to come up with innovative coffee gear to make your brewing easier (and tastier). Our products are hand-assembled and shipped from our headquarters, in the heart of Europe, and from our warehouse in the US. 
This is our third Kickstarter campaign and we’re proud to say that all rewards to the 10,617 backers from the first campaign and 2,389 backers from our second campaign were successfully delivered. Our team is now even bigger and stronger, and we’re ready to take your specialty coffee lifestyle to an even higher level. 

We have already completed an extensive durability and grind comparison test that made us certain we have created a great product. As soon as we are funded, we will be able to fine tune the grinder, kick-off the production and ship it to our backers. 
We have mapped out the critical path and have made all necessary precautions to ensure we can scale production if we surpass our goal. We are very confident in our timeline, but it's our core belief to never settle for a mediocre product, so we won't be compromising on the quality in order to save time. Should any production challenges or processing delays arise in terms of production or delivery, we promise to keep you updated every step of the way and deliver you the best quality product as soon as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The main material used in ARCO is aluminium - 6082 and 7075 space-grade aluminium is an ensures a maximum life span of the product due to its extreme durability, thus ARCo is a product with a nearly unlimited life span.
Along aluminium, we use steel grinding burrs that also ensure durability. Only a small amount of material in the grinder is plastic that is easy to remove and recycled if needed. 
The motor for the electric grinder conforms with international standards for electric devices and due to a small workload, the motor is expected to be as durable as the body of the product.
Reusability and recyclability
ARCO is a coffee grinder, a tool, that is designed to be durable and long lasting without any defects. As a product with a long life span, it does not pose a threat for additional burden on landfills, also considering the fact that ARCO is manufactured of materials that are not bonded together for easy separation of materials and recycling (aluminium, steel, plastic).
The packaging will be designed using recyclable materials that will be easy to separate and recycle.
Environmentally friendly factories
The building blocks of ARCO are sourced from Europe (Italy, Slovenia) with some additional parts manufacutred in China (Shenzen). We have high standards when it comes to choosing our suppliers and manufacturing companies. All the companies we work with are highly reputable companies with premium quality standards and good work environment for the workers.
Sustainable Distribution
The most important aspect of sustainability in our delivery is transport optimization. We have an established transport route from the companies we work with and thus we can optimize the delivery of all our products. ARCO will be added in our transportation plan with little additional transportation stress. 
With precise planning of deliveries we optimize delivery cost and we ensure that no container leaves the factory unless loaded in full, thus ensuring perfect optimisation of transport.
Delivery to end customers will be handled via our delivery partners with established delivery routes that are as well optimized to perfection.

updates.update_userinfo: COVID sucks but there is no challenge we can't overcome!
updates.update_content:
Hi there my fellow coffee lovers!
It's been a while since we posted an update about ARCO and I believe it's time to shed some light on the development of the project. Read further and check the progress of our engineering team and a few challenges that the pandemic is facing us with.

Hi there dear coffee lovers!

It's been a while but there's a good reason for that as we are getting everything ready for the manufacturing of ARCO. But even if one part of the team is fully engaged in the ARCO project, we are not resting. A couple of weeks ago our team had a great discussion about future products and there are some very cool coffee products coming in the next months and years.

What kicked off as a crazy idea, evolved into a coffee grinder that simply ... makes sense. In the past couple of years we have been grinding, testing, tuning and fine-tuning this little gadget that is now ARCO. Was it easy? No. Was it a challenge? Yes. Was it fun? YES!
ARCO is a game changer, raising more than our both previous Kickstarter projects (GOAT Mug and GINA) combined. Crazy, right? This is the moment when we simply need to say – THANK YOU! You, our backers, keep us motivated to innovate and take a different approach when crafting new coffee products.

updates.update_userinfo: ABOUT A GRIND - THE LAB RESULTS
updates.update_content:
-- ATTENTION: COFFEE GEEK LEVEL 10/10 --
After we published the grind test results in the last update, quite a debate about grinders, particle size distribution and other coffee geek topics emerged. And to be honest, we love these kind of debates! We're super stoked to see that our Kickstarter backers are not just coffee lovers but even have  excellent knowledge of the physics of coffee grinding.

updates.update_userinfo: ABOUT A GRIND - HOW DOES ARCO COMPARE?
updates.update_content:
We have been gathering feedback from all of you in the last couple of weeks and many of you were eager to see how ARCO performs compared to other grinders in the market. In this update we will share the test results with you. But do keep in mind - we are not independent coffee gear reviewers. That is why we did not clearly mark the brand and model of the grinders that we used for comparison. 
We split the results in two groups - we separately tested two electric grinders with ARCO 2-in-1 and a popular high quality hand grinder with the ARCO hand grinder.

campaign.story:
Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | PressKit | YouTube 
 Your 3D printer is your new kitchen assistant
Cakewalk 3D is a precise, effective and handy upgrade that converts your desktop 3D printer into a food printer. It enables you to unleash your creativity in the kitchen, producing detailed shapes in a few minutes which would take the best chef a couple hours to design.

Finish up your meal like never before
Do you want to save time and impress your hosts with fine dining? If so, the Cakewalk 3d is the perfect printing device for you.
More than just another paste extruder, Cakewalk 3D is an all-included box designed by a French pastry chef. Find everything you need to print out your vision: ingredients, silicone baking mat, food-safe extruder and detailed instructions to train yourself on your first 3D prints. You will quickly achieve amazing results.


Never fail a birthday cake
We've all failed a cake design at least once in our life. Now you can create your own cake lace patterns, or custom decorations that you can add on the top of the next birthday cake. Thanks to the nozzle of 1 mm you can 3D print delicate cake designs or unique treats that no one will ever find in a store.

3D Print stunning appetizers
What about designing fun shapes on your computer and 3D print them on crackers for an astonishing cocktail ? We provide you recipes and ingredients to succeed in your first prints, and let you be the inventor of new snacks.
Create incredible plates like a star-rated chef
If you don't feel like a member of the piping bag world champion league, or will never graduate from any fancy chef schools, Cakewalk 3d is your ally to accomplish star-rated chef recipes.  Like your own personal kitchen assistant, Cakewalk 3d lets you focus on cooking while it takes care of the rest.

Convert your leftovers into savory prints
Let’s face it, there’s no much fun in eating the leftovers. Now you can mash them and use Cakewalk 3d to turn them into savory snacks. A brocoli-based crocodile or a parsnip-carrot unicorn looks more appetizing for everyone. 
 Cakewalk3d is really easy to set up into your own 3D printer and works like your regular plastic extruder.
Cakewalk3d works with Creality, Anet, Anycubic, Alfawise, Prusa… and any FDM printer
Cakewalk 3d fully supports dozens of 3D cartesian printers.  We have successfully tested on major brands such as Creality, Anycubic, Alfawise, Prusa or Anet...  We provide instructions and the 3D files  for free download, that will fit for a wide range of 3D printers.

A new chapter in your 3D printing journey
To adapt Cakewalk 3d to your printer, all you need is to 3D print 3 supporting parts:
1 connector between the cartridge and the Nema motor
  2 detachable rings to hold the cartridge
  The prints take less than 10 hours to complete on most desktop 3D printers and the CAD files are available for download. We can handle it for you if needed, using professional powder-based 3D printing technology for better accuracy.
 Over the past weeks, we gathered feedbacks from makers to food-lovers accross various fablabs, incubators and cooking schools.
"Innovation and a lot of fun for our first workshop" @Fablab ESILV
"A new step in our cooking journey and a milestone for the curry sauce!" @Fablab CentraleSupelec
"Cakewalk 3d is the first step into the stimulating and inspiring world of 3D food printing!" @SmartFoodParis
Tricky to see people smiling behind masks, still eyes were lit with wonder! 
 We believe everyone is creative. So we've designed Cakewalk3d to be simple enough for anyone to use. 
Whether you're a professional creator or a weekend tinkerer, the Cakewalk3d is a powerful tool for bringing your food ideas to life.
You can use your favorite 3D slicer in order to prepare your masterpieces, just like you would normally do for any kind of prints. 

To help everyone with the first steps, we include an ingredient mix in every box (you can choose between French meringue, vegan meringue, or salted veggie mix). And the 3D files of our best recipes are available on the major 3D marketplaces.

Feel confused? Our support group on Facebook got you covered. You're welcome to join here!
 Maker Kit   = extruder + 1 silicone mat + 1 food mix sachet 49 €
Standard Kit = Maker kit + couplers + motor Nema 17 + screws  89 €
Best Value kit = Standard kit + support parts already 3D printed and assembled + 2 extra ingredients 129 €
Cakewalk 3D + 3D Printer bundle: for those who don’t own a 3D printer, the Best value kit will be assembled and ready to be installed on the 3D printer included.
Compatible materials
Cakewalk3d works with many different recipes, as long as they meet the required viscosity. We have successfully 3d printed with:
Chocolate
Meringue
Vegetable puree
Ketchup
Guacamole
Honey
If you don't know what to start with, no worries. A tested food mix will be included with every reward, you' ll just need to add water and you can start to print right away! 3 food mix recipes are already available: salted veggie mix, french meringue or vegan meringue.
A recipes guide with the detailed steps and the setting profile for your favorite slicers will be also included and constantly updated on our website.
Safety in the kitchen
We designed Cakewalk3d with food safety as a priority, and selected the best material for the mechanical parts. Only food-grade stainless steel, silicone and PP will be in contact with your food. All parts can go to the dishwasher and will be certified.
We also include a silicone baking mat in order to protect the bed of your 3d printer and get a food printing space as safe as possible.

Easy to use
Using Cakewalk 3d doesn’t mean you will never 3D print plastic anymore. It takes less than 30 minutes to remove your extruder and install the new device. Cakewalk is working as an extruder so there’s no need to change anything on the connections on your card or even your firmware. Slicing profiles are provided for selected materials.
Open design
We chose to make our products extendable, upgradable, and easy to maintain.
Except the food-safe core parts of the extruder, most parts are standard spare parts that can be sourced. This campaign is designed to help us fund the injection molds for the core parts.
3D Printing lovers are part of a strong community and we hope that more and more makers will experiment and promote food printing thanks to Cakewalk 3d. We’re eager to get feedback and don’t worry we’ll be always here to help!

Hi, my name is Marine. I’m a 3D printing executive, a graduated pastry chef, and the creator of Cakewalk 3d. I live in Paris, France.
I love innovating with food and that's why I started Cakewalk 3d, first as a side project during the spring. It all began when we were all quarantined in France, and I wanted to automate my own pastry techniques. With a mechanical engineer, we worked together remotely, each one testing and improving on its own 3D printer.  We gather our result daily, and we iterated over 3 months.
Once I started showing other pastry lovers the desserts I was getting, there was so much interest that I knew it was something I had to share with the whole 3D printing community. I worked and designed new recipes during months (mostly tested and approved by my coworkers!) and searched for the best production methods.
Even if I always want to 3D print everything, I came to the conclusion that the core parts of the extruder need to be injected. So I worked with an engineering team to select the best providers and design the molds. The campaign is aimed to raise enough money to pay these molds.
Thanks to your support, Cakewalk 3d will be soon in production, and I am really excited to share what we’ve built with the Kickstarter community.
If you’d like to see some of the designs and recipes I’ve been getting with Cakewalk 3D, you can find me on Instagram @marine_corebaillais
May 2020 : The first designs
May 2020 : First 3D printed parts
May 2020 : First prototype assembled
June 2020 : Corentin's trial on Creality Ender
July 2020 : New version on Marine's Anet 3D printer
July 2020 : Testing new recipes
PLAY

August 2020 : 3D Printing Chocolate on Thibault's Alfawise
September 2020: Prototype testing on Alfawise and Anycubic
September 2020 : Final version, ready for production
October 2020: Burger printing in progress...

Share this with friends on Facebook.

THE REINVENTION OF THE BASKETBALL NET
 MEET KHARBONET 
The Basketball net is arguably the most important piece of equipment in basketball -- equaled perhaps only by the ball itself. Without the net, there is no game. While having a net is essential, it's also highly important to have a net of an appropriate height.
There was a time when basketball nets were a simple thing. From wooden peach baskets attached to balcony railings to today’s unbreakable basketball nets, the evolution of the basketball goal was influenced to a degree by 2016 NBA Hall of Fame inductee Shaquille O’Neal. BUT first, why we need a basketball net on the hoop?
First Carbon Fiber Basketball Net you’ve been waiting for.
There are some benefits to having a net on the hoop. Now nets help break a ball's fall. The net helps control the direction of the ball when going through the rim, besides when the ball hits the rim first and bounces through, The net helps slow the ball down so it's not always bouncing the headlight after a make and usually makes the ball land in the same general area after going through. Nets give players a sense of depth for good aim and allow refs to see what the basket was made of. Without a net it's sometimes hard to tell if someone has made a bucket or not. Beyond these functions, nets add to the audio, kinetic and aesthetic experience that leaves players driving for "nothin but net." Think about how your net might move, look, sound and function. Unconventional approaches are encouraged.
BLACK & WHITE CARBON FIBER BASKETBALL NET.
We carefully designed it to give you the most satisfaction on your basketball game.
 WHY KHARBONET IS OUTSTANDING?
   EXTREMELY DURABLE 
The unique material used in the KHARBONET assures good weather resistance. For extra protection against the harsh weather the fibers are also UV stabilised. ALL WEATHER!

 SUPER LIGHT & ULTRA FLEXIBLE 
The special feature of the rope themselves is the low weight. The special material used assures extreme lightness. For better flexibility during temperature treatment double criss cross knitting was implemented.

 UNIQUE INNOVATIVE DESIGN, SAFE & HANDMADE 
Carbon fiber basketball net is being made by hand, which means each individual rope is being inspected from the beggining which provides high quality standard.
Carbon fiber basketball net is also easy washable!
The way our basketball net is designed, a better visualisation can be achieved, which means basketball players can better evaluate the net depth, which is crucial for succesfull throws on larger distances.

 BEST MATERIAL 
The basketball net is knitted out of carbon fibers. Some call it also the material of the future. This gives the net special values and uniqueness.

 FITS ON ANY HOOP 
No matter what brand the basketball ring is - our net fits them all.
Suitable for outdoor & indoor court !

 TOP SOUND 
Speaking of sound. Get your own net and then we can talk which net gives the better sound. While scoring nets "KHARBONET" is the only option for the best satisfaction while playing basketball. You have to try!

COMPARISON

THE LIFESPAN 
The Lifespan of CARBON FIBER BASKETBALL NET  is 3X longer than nylon nets, so we say that KHARBONET breaks the rules! hehe :)
 Remember that!
Lifespan of nylon nets...
TECHNOLOGY
Carbon fibers are fibers thinner than a human hair, about 5-10 micrometres in diameter and composed mainly of carbon atoms. Carbon fibers are classified in mechanical engineering as a group of composite materials. This means that the material is composed of two or more building blocks that are joined together. In this case, carbon fibers appear as nuts made from organic materials, followed by fillers. Carbon fibers are often presented as a composite of the future, mainly because of its mechanical properties and low weight, making the material much more useful. If the fibers are acting in all directions, the fibers are positioned in such a way that some fibers are horizontally left up and vertically, and the fibers intertwine and transmit forces in all directions, usually such fabrication of fibers is said to be a fabric. Everybody knows the carbon fiber fabric, but what about the carbon fiber rope?
Prototyping...
However, if carbon fibers are oriented in one direction and are twisted or cast in a spiral during the temperature treatment, carbon ropes are formed. Carbon fiber ropes are the future!
Introducing the first Carbon Fiber Basketball Net on the market. WHITE EDITION.
TESTING AND QUALITY
Carbon fibers have very high resistance to mechanical forces, especially they are very resistant to tension. These properties have been used very well in the industry and in the technology, so carbon fibers are suitable for any kind of use. Since we wanted a very durable rope and Basketball Net,we simulated the most complex conditions and we designed the most versatile basketball net. We designed black and white version!
No net , no sweat...
What you can't see, it's what matters the most. It’s all about the little things that make the difference.
The world's most versatile basketball net.
SPEND LESS WITH KICKSTARTER
MORE EPIC PICS
Black CARBON FIBER BASKETBALL NET and white edition behind.
TIMELINE
FOUNDER
DOMEN VRSIC Industrial engineer/Founder
Creative problem solver since 1995
 WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT OUR KICKSTARTER? 
We have put thousands of hours into this project to make it live! campaign.story:
The World Game is a highly engaging geography board game for 2 to 5 players that’s easy to learn. A fast-playing adventure full of excitement.


Race around the world, pass famous landmarks, learn about countries, recognize flags and find locations on the map. Pick up your action cards on the way to get ahead or slow down other travelers. It’s super educational and engaging for kids and adults alike. The more you play – the more you know. 
We will ship a free World Map Poster to every backer that pledges for the game. The map shows all countries and capital cities, along with flags sorted by continent. The map will help you master the game and become a Geography Wiz!

The World Map wall poster will only be available in this Kickstarter pack. It will later retail as a separate item.
The game's objective is to be the first player to complete the race around the world and cross the finish line. You move forward by winning with strong country facts or by answering geography challenges correctly.
There are 194 countries and there is a card for each country. Soon, you'll be able to recognize most of them.
Every turn each player draws a card from the country card pile. When it’s your turn, roll one dice. Then you have to choose between 2 options. Calling out a fact or a challenge from your country card.
Pick a fact you believe is the strongest and try to beat other players. But be careful, if you lose, someone else will move forward. 
Challenge! In order to move forward you will have to answer a challenge question from another player. You will either have to recognize the flag, name the continent, capital city or show  a country on the map. If you answer wrong, other players will get a chance to move forward.
The difficulty level of the game is easily adaptable to players of all ages. You can play a variety of easy to hard challenges, depending on geography skill.
This is where it gets really interesting. There is another deck of cards which is full of action. These are the 26 action cards that you pick up along the way, every time you reach a new continent. Mess with your opponents with 10 different actions or save yourself and strategize to win the game. 
You will get a solid, large illustrated game board, with landmarks, colored continents and 51 spots, including special spots that will boost or slow you down. Each country is represented by a number corresponding to its country card.
We wish to bring geography and the scale of the world closer to people in a fun and engaging way, which will hopefully spark a future interest and curiosity about our world. 
“Students frequently mentioned learning things in their geography class that brought clarity or connections to existing knowledge, that led them to want to learn more.”
SDSU Study
We have been developing this game for quite some time. There were numerous prototypes, figuring out the length and structure of the race, deciding on illustrations and color coding while preserving the learning mechanisms that make it an effective educational tool. In the end we developed a game that involved equal parts knowledge, strategy and luck, while being fun and engaging for all players.
 December 2019 – Board game idea
 February 2020 – Initial game concept
 April 2020 – First paper game mockup
 May 2020 – Extensive gameplay testing
 June 2020 – Game adaptation
 July 2020 – Final game testing
 August 2020 – Development prototype
 September 2020 – Illustration finalization
 October 2020 – Supplier prototype testing
 November 2020 – KICKSTARTER launch 
 December 2020 – Mass production
 February 2021 – Shipping to warehouses
 March 2021 – Deliveries
  Backers from the United States will receive the imperial version, whereas backers from the rest of the world will receive the metric version of the game. If you wish to receive a different version than stated here, please make a note on Kickstarter when pledging for a reward. 
We're happy to announce customs friendly shipping to the EU, the USA, Canada, Australia, China and the UK. We plan to ship the game by March 2021.
For any press or retail inquiries, you can contact us at info@playworldgame.com. We've also prepared a press kit you can download from our Google Drive folder. Here you'll find HQ product images and game descriptions.

I also agree with Katharina on the point about GDP. Since you have the highest point, how about the lowest point? I love reading about the unknown places in the world, captivated by the stories about cave exploring and extreme diving. I get goosebumps reading them.

Oh i thought it would be in negatives? For example, lowest exposed land point is Dead Sea shore at -413m. Deepest cave would be fun too. There is the deepest blue hole, Dragon Hole, at 300.89 meters (987 feet), but in South China Sea. The second deepest blue hole is Dean's Blue Hole, at 202 metres (663 ft), located in Bahamas.

I got these ideas from the authoritative Lonely Planet publication called "The Travel Book" which highlights 230 countries and provides wonderful factoids with beautiful full-color photographs of each of the entities. Each entry has a Trademark category listing multiple cultural references along with other categories entitled "Local customs", "Places of interest", "Random Facts", and my favorite "Read, Listen Watch, Eat, and Drink which features popular titles and food".
That's just a few of the fun factoids for those 2 countries alone.

campaign.story:
Mag-Net Tiles is a fun and engaging device designed to improve children’s creativity. It develops their concentration span, attention to detail, and nurtures decision making skills.
Color TALE is a colouring book based on Mag-Net Tiles. It helps users to a create colourful and beautiful models. It’s also inspiring, innovative and refreshing.
It is a natural remedy for anxiety and provides tension relief for all ages.
Nowadays smartphones and tablets have changed the way children are playing and interacting with the real World on a daily basis. It's therefore challenging to capture their attention with a tangible item. This situation can be easily resolved by supporting their imagination with Mag-Net Tiles and Paintbook by Shape & Share. These tools greatly improve early development of your children's hidden talents and gradually increases their off-screen imagination
The Mag-Net Tiles booklet is packed with layout patterns and ready given shapes and ideas so your children can build variations of fun structures and designs. It includes not only ideas for creating two-dimensional mathematical figures, but also three-dimensional shapes and colourful images that are appealing and intriguing for every single one of us. Encourage your child to look at the images of this creative magnetic art book and build presented replicas but also allowing them to create their own versions of colourful masterpieces.
Expand your child's creativity with Mag-Net Tiles by Shape & Share.
Stimulate your child to construct a world of imagination and expression through the use of various shapes and colours.
Magnetic tiles are fun to build with, enhancing your child's tactile playing experience, engaged them in new exploration and development of their very own creative force, stimulating both cognitive and problem solving abilities.
Mag-Net Tiles are suitable for all ages above 4 (4+). They are not only a toy, but also an advanced educational tool, stimulating and developing cognitive abilities beyond normal play actvities. Specifically with maths, science and practical skills.
In addition to skill development, Mag-Net Tiles provides a multiplayer platform hence also improving teamwork skills.
The unique beauty of Mag-Net Tiles encourages players to design endless forms, shapes and creations. In other words THE FUN NEVER STOPS! A toy that never grows old. Children are given absolute freedom to create multiple shapes and designs. As a result it decreases anxiety and acts as an ADD remedy (Attention Deficiency Disorder).
Made out of skin-safe and durable materials and has been tested and approved by authorised laboratories of SGS (Société Générale de Surveillance) for toy examination, in France. Mag-Net Tiles by Shape & Share is specially designed to safeguard your child’s health, fulfilling all the requirements towards toy safety and security of European Regulations (CE).
Folding stand is specially designed for playing Mag-Net Tiles Luxe Set board, and it is now available as a perk option. The folding stand contains three parts made out of high-quality materials that can easily be assembled in seconds. This is a practical additional option and usable support.
Made of 4 mm Perspex, strong and durable.
*Available in a separate perk together with a Luxe Set.
Color TALE Paintbook is a smart way to deliver cognitive development among kids. Our CTP consists of modern concepts to enhance child development. Created based on a variant of the Mag-Net Tiles with 2D projections, geometric shapes and pearls of wisdom. Guidelines are included in order to ensure a perfect end-user experience.
THIS BOOK IS DESIGNED WITH A UNIQUE PERSPECTIVE FOR KIDS.
 HOW IT WORKS? 
An idea is to match  the right colours with their matching spot, and in doing so we would form a vivid image in front of us created in a colourful artistic manner. The stickers provided in the middle of the book are meant to give users a clear idea on how to create the graphic of their choosing. Formed graphics should already be familiar from the jig-saw puzzle of the Mag-Net Tiles.
In addition to the stimulation of your child's 3D (three dimensional) perception, our experience has shown that the users often respond with a high amount of comfort. 
Moreover, the motivational quotes included within from the great scientists, philosophers, and artists, known as the “Pearls of Wisdom” adds up to the stimulation of kid's minds turning them into creative architects.
   * Now available in multiple languages!
Mag-Net Tiles and Color TALE Paintbook are one of a kind educational tool-toys designed to develop every child’s thinking ability, focus and gives them a strong sense of colour matching practice. It has been tested and approved from many different festivals organised by kindergartens, private and international schools. 
In addition, both products are a great starting tool-toys for teaching mathematics, science, and geometry fused with creativity for giving an effortless learning experience for children.
British International school l Deutsche Schule Belgrad l Fluid Design Forum l
l Rudjer Bošković Int. School l International Woman's Club - Belgrade l
l LogoPolis l Kindergarten Mala Akademija l Kindergarten Mala Fabrika Mašte
and many more...


There are two types of deductive reasoning - a fact so elementary it often escapes from our consciousness. Deductive reasoning requires a premise, a conclusion, and a justification linking the two. Sometimes called axiomatic reasoning, an invention of deduction has long been attributed to the ancient Greeks. Deductive reasoning is a skill that can be developed and Mag-Net Tiles is a tool for just that, more than a game that improves our deductive reasoning skills in a fun, effortless and an efficient manner.

                      Majority of the schools today do not encourage creative approaches for learning and therefore our children are suffocated with deductive reasoning. Deductive logic provides a system of tools and techniques that allow the truth-values of certain classes of statements—known as propositions— to be evaluated for consistency. Beginning with propositions properties known to be true or false, deductive logic allows us to derive other statements with already known truth-values. Simultaneously it allows us to identify incorrectly set truth-values and inconsistencies. Learning deductive logic provides a basic theoretical foundation that is helpful when studying more complex (and less exact) forms of logic.
We hope to bring the concept of Mag-Net Tiles - learning tool and Color TALE paint book to every school in the world.
Mag-Net Tiles are one of the most effective ways to give your child an exciting hands-on learning experience within a classroom, or alternatively among friends and family members. It basically provides a foundation for the kids to develop their creativity and keep them engaged for hours through building mind boggling creations of their own. Talk to your Educational professional and start presenting this fantastic learning tool which will contribute enormously when it comes to advancements of your child’s thinking process and logic. Moreover, Mag-Net Tiles is not only a game for children, but it also helps us, as parents to spend our valuable time with our kids. This fantastic family game is also being used in the Homes for the elderly, and it is already being loved by many adults.
 If you are currently unable to afford or support this campaign, feel free to contact us and we are always happy to help and provide this Mag-Net Tiles and Color TALE paint book to you or your local educational providers.
Many thanks to all of the team members for devoting their valuable time and skills from the beginning of the campaign and supporting Shape & Share in order to succeed at all stages of the development process.
What age is appropriate?
The Mag-Net Tiles can be enjoyed from the age of 4, up to 120...
Toy safety
Mag-Net Tiles have been tested and approved in authorised laboratories of SGS (Société Générale de Surveillance) for toy examination in France, Standards for safety and security are agreed with European regulations (CE).
 What are the cognitive benefits that the use of this game has for the user? 
The main potential resides in the training of an abstract thinking, it helps in developing mental health with benefits such as increased focus and decreased anxiety, according to our research.
  The given three-dimensional-shapes stimulate the sense of visual perception and allows us to create further images. The youngest ones benefit with a sense for "serialisation, structure and order". The black board guides your attention on your work and while adding more and more colour-tiles this effect gradually get´s stronger.
What about creativity?
The younger child will probably form "pictures" of his or her own imagination. Just like the good old "Tangram", but today with our more appealing shapes and colours. The only limit here is your imagination! The older users are getting stimulated by our models as well as any other real World ideas (e.g. art, technology, nature, daily life items, logos...)
Can my motor skills develop with this toy?
Since the suggested models are challenging to work on accurately, it improves our eye-hand coordination (motor skills in other words). This means that you will, in the process of laying the tiles properly, enhance your motor skills.
 Is this game a family-toy as well? 
Certainly, it is always fun to create some innovative and engaging projects together, and do that as a game! The advantage is that you can keep your assembled works and exhibit them with pride at "your united projects" section.
Why do you think this game is motivating?
Of course it may seem challenging at first, positioning the tiles in the correct way, but as you are progressing further you come closer to fulfil your chosen project! Which in result is very satisfying!
Can the toy been played in more than one way?
There are numerous possibilities to play this game. Such as, you could work with your child on a picture and one will "secretly" change the previous one! Now would be the question: What has changed? Will you remember? This can be fun and could train your memory. You could compete in who can build the fastest, the opportunities are endless.
Is the toy worth the costs?
The board and the tiles are produced from high-quality material and hold an approval from the SGS and CE certificate (see previous questions). You will feel and see that our product has a high-valency. Besides it is a one-time investment and if you look after it, you will enjoy the Mag-Net Tiles for a long time!
Does the toy reflect the child's individuality?
The fact that in "playing" there is no right or wrong, it`s evolving with our game!
                     The beginner will first maybe get fascinated by just laying the tiles without a special order, but will soon lay simple "pictures" and will from there, develop more and more abstract and challenging models... Everything can develop at the speed the player himself chooses.

campaign.story:
Ever since I saw someone using a skateboard and a windsurfing sail on a parking lot I was hooked. I just wasn’t happy with the design of the board. It was just a skateboard. I wanted to design it specifically for street windsurfing. No shortcuts. You can’t just take a skateboard, a longboard, or a mountain board and say it’s good enough. Surely Windsurfers deserve a proper “land-board”.
So I’ve designed it. I call it Urban Breez.




You know how many times of falling into water it took before the windsurf started to move? Now kids, as well as adults, can learn to windsurf faster and easier than ever before.


Learn about upwind and downwind. Learn when to tighten the sail and when to loosen it. Learn how to jibe and tuck. All that in your very first lesson.






For those days when the wind is ideal and you don’t have enough time for a windsurfing trip to the sea. 5 minutes to rig and you’re already cruising. Plus, it’s a great workout!

campaign.story:
Dahlia BAGpack - multifunctional & sustainable 
Dahlia BAGpack is a multifunctional backpack that easily turns into a shoulder bag. It is made from Piñatex; a natural, sustainable textile made from pineapple leaves. All the materials are 100% vegan and cruelty-free. The backpack is carefully designed + ethically made in a small local artisanal workshop.
We support slow fashion and design and produce our bags using the same values.
Who are we? 
We are Fi by Gaja, a small startup fashion brand from Slovenia. Our sustainable bags have a clean and thoughtful design.
Our brand emphasizes individuality, freedom and having a connection with nature. It is aimed at urban and environmentally conscious women.
Collection
Why is Dahlia BAGpack multifunctional? 
Because you can turn the backpack into a shoulder bag in just three easy steps! The shoulder straps of the backpack are removable with a detachable metal ring. The handle of the bag made from Piñatex is also removable. 
Removable straps
Multifunctional
Dahlia BAGpack like a bag
The bag closes with a magnetic button and zipper. At the back, there is also a practical pocket with a zipper, where you can store the things you want to have to hand.
Details
Why is Dahlia BAGpack sustainable and what is Piñatex?
The backpack is sustainable because we use carefully selected materials which are cruelty-free and have a low environmental impact. 
Piñatex is an innovative natural textile made from waste pineapple leaf fibre.
Piñatex’s journey starts in the Philippines where the pineapple leaves, a by-product of the existing agricultural industry, are collected. The leaves of the plant are processed to extract the fibres and these are manufactured into a non-woven substrate. No extra land, water or pesticides are required to produce the raw material.
Piñatex is also R E A C H compliant. It is lightweight, durable and water-resistant. The material is sustainable, ethically sourced and has a low environmental footprint.
The dyes used for Piñatex are GOTS approved and the resins comply with AFIRM standards.
Piñatex® certificates
We already have great experience using the material when producing some small bag collections with it. It is pleasant to the touch and has an interesting texture.
The lining of the backpack is made from organic cotton with a Fi by Gaja original print. It has both a zippered and open pocket.
Materials
The shoulder straps are made using recycled ECONYL yarn. Econyl is made from recycled fishing nets and textile waste. The material is OEKO TEX 100 certified. The straps are removable with a detachable metal ring.
Straps from Econyl
Another aspect of sustainability
The backpack is lightweight and the well thought out design gives it that timeless quality. It can be worn in all seasons and combined with different styles.
You can wear it for a walk around the city, for a business event or a weekend getaway in the countryside.
How big is Dahlia BAGpack?
The dimensions of the Dahlia BAGpack are: 30 cm x 33 cm x 10 cm (11,8 in x 13 in x 4 in). It fits a 13-inch laptop and everything on the picture: a book, a planner, a wallet, sunglasses, a mobile phone, 4 x Pencil case from Piñatex, a tablet and 2 x mandarin orange.

Rewards
All the rewards that include the Dahlia BAGpack will be shipped to backers on Earth Day on 22 April 2021. We will send you a survey to collect information about your colour preferences and your shipping address soon after the campaign is finished.
Collection of Dahlia BAGpacks: light grey, black, light green and blue colour.
Light green and blue Dahlia BAGpack
Light grey Dahlia BAGpack
Black Dahlia BAGpack
Pencil cases: light grey, black, light green and blue.
Timeline
What are we planning to do with the money that we raise on our campaign?
70% of our goal will be spent on the purchase of sustainable materials (Piñatex, organic cotton with a custom print and Econyl straps + all the metal accessories) and for the manufacturing. 10% will cover our other expenses (promotions, photo & video shootings). All the rest will be used for the future development of new products and collections and also for the expansion of the Fi by Gaja brand.

Designed and ethically made in Slovenia 
Multifunctional Dahlia BAGpack is designed and entirely made in Slovenia. We are collaborating with a small artisanal workshop from Vrhnika, where almost all Fi by Gaja bags made from Piñatex are produced.
Our collections are usually made in small series. If we will have the opportunity to widen our production, we will still strive to cooperate with other small local businesses.
It is our priority to keep our production in our local environment and to ensure our contractors have a fair wage and regulated working conditions.

 Fi by Gaja journey
Gaja Hanzel, Fi by Gaja founder and designer
Fi by Gaja fashion brand and startup were created by Gaja Hanzel in 2018. She is a fashion and graphic designer and she noticed that sustainability and design don't always go hand in hand. Her passion for design and caring for the environment motivated her to focus on designing modern looking bags made from sustainable materials.
In 2019, she signed up for a mentoring program in the business innovation centre Inkubator Sežana, where her idea and the philosophy of the brand and products became clear.
She is collaborating with local small businesses who help her bring her ideas to reality.
"I have been carrying around the idea of this backpack for a while now; Kickstarter offers me a great opportunity to share our brand and our products abroad and make my idea a reality. We are a small start-up, any financial help and support goes a long way and I thank everyone that will support this project and our entire philosophy to allow us to expand and continue our journey." Gaja
Dahlia BAGpacks
Don't forget to follow all of Fi by Gaja stories on social media.

campaign.story:
Documenting stories inside the military hospital in the Croatian capital during the pandemic
  Within 6 weeks I'll be carefully documenting stories of patients in the hospital under psychiatric treatment during the pandemic. 
Twice a week patients gather to talk about their mental and psychological problems, disorders.
It's mostly work and problems at work, problems inside marriage, problems with children, relatives.. .Things that accumulated through time and have risen to such heights that it was impossible for them to solve on their own.

No names of patients will be mentioned. No names of doctors will be mentioned.
No photographs of patients.

A kind of prose that brings mental health issues to the foreground, in a way that makes you reflect on the cruelties of other people, who are "sane" and claim that they need no treatment (whereas they should indeed be involved in the process of making them aware of the damage they are causing to the "sick"people).
A book that opens your eyes, makes you laugh (at times), but also makes you see that "everybody hurts sometime" (R.E.M).

Author: Mariann Makrai
